text: Saroj Khan (born Nirmala Nagpal; 22 November 1948 â€“ 3 July 2020) was an Indian dance choreographer in Hindi cinema. She was born at the Bombay State (present day Maharashtra), India. She was known as "The Mother of Dance/Choreography in India". Her best known works was choreographing for Mr. India, Nagina and Chandni. Khan died on 3 July 2020 from cardiac arrest at a Mumbai hospital, aged 71. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Indian choreographers Category:Indian dancers
title: Saroj Khan
